derivation: from G2819 (κληρονόμος) and the base of G3551 (κληρονόμος) (in its original sense of partitioning, i.e. (reflexively) getting by apportionment);
strongs_def: a sharer by lot, i.e. inheritor (literally or figuratively); by implication, a possessor
outline:
1. one who receives by lot, an heir
    1. an heir
    2. in Messianic usage, one who receives his allotted possession by right of sonship
  2. one who has acquired or obtained the portion allotted to him
